title: Fuck you're ban rito
body: If a player who calls sup and locks in yasuo then proceeds to take my midlane refuses to cooperate with the roles called Feeding is a must. You cant have dickheads like that around then give me ban for feeding. Ban that jackass for ruining my possibilities of having a decent game

replies.body:
1. No one made you feed. You could have dodged or played the game out normally and reported him after.

2. Your*
Why the fuck does a level 153 play blind pick? Shouldn't you have realized that it's never worth it to not play draft about 120 levels ago?

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7vJsa0rF,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-10-12T03:30:28.264+0000)
>
> Why the fuck does a level 153 play blind pick? Shouldn't you have realized that it's never worth it to not play draft about 120 levels ago?

you can't get called out for playing on hit AD singed in blind :)

I play blind when I want to test a specific champ (no bans pls) or when I want to get in game quickly. 

Then again, I'm a support main and can fill any other role cos I've taken my time to learn those other roles. So I don't really care if I need to fill.

Blind pick has no assigned roles. Calls is but a courtesy and not a rule.

Intentionally feeding is not a must.

You could also be considered a jack ass for ruining everyone elses game.

You're only looking for trouble if you choose Blind Pick. 
You have no room to complain if you choose that mode. 

You choose to feed. You could have chosen Draft, not feed, and enjoy the game.
If you didn't like your role then dodge.
Riot is a company, not "ban". If I'm not misremembering Ban is a character in the Get Backers, not Riot.
No, Rito are no ban. But it sounds like you are.
I saw on op gg ur game when u play Zilean and that {{champion:145}}  is a feeder hes score was 11/17/19

RIot is not "ban", they might have an employee named "ban" but no.

Notes:

* *: blind pick has no "roles", its more of a " i want to win like a normal team"
* : feeding is NOT a must, you could have went botlane and played out the game and possibly win, or go afk! atleast the enemies advantage isnt that they can oneshot you.
* based on your thought process and behavior, you deserve the ban more then him.

Well, don't be toxic. Just mute him, and report him after. You get games like that, should of just left champ select and taken the 5 minute que timer or you could of just surrendered at 15/20 mins. You should expect trolls in some games, part of the community.
